Class TrItem

Base class for all items via TrMainItem or TrPageLevelItem. Inherits TrBase.

LineCount

Gets the number of lines of the item; from Collection-wide (returns many) down to single TrTextLine (returns 1). When the item is below TrTextLine-level, LineCount returns 0.
